name: Infinitely up 4
description:
Description

Infinitely up 4 - this is a puzzle with elements of physics, in which you have to build a tower of randomly issued figures that have physical properties and can interact with each other. When building a tower, plan what and where it is preferable to fold, the difficulty is that if you drop at least one piece, you lose and you have to start over. Can you build the highest tower?

Features:

- A variety of shapes

- Interesting and addictive gameplay

- Minimalistic style

- Pleasant music
